body:
Official UHC Information Page
IP:  Node42.Minecrafted.net:25593
Version: 1.7.2/1.7.5
Scenarios: Scroll Down ;)
Time/Dates: Randomly chosen at anytime, I don't have a schedule.
Hosts: roboticboy16, Sulorak

FAQ
Q: How long is the match?
A: Usually 1 & 1/2 hour.

Q: What timezone is this?
A: Eastern Standard Time (US)

Q: Are you allowed to strip-mine?
A: No, you are only allowed to dig straight 8 blocks if you hear sounds. You are not allowed to strip-mine intentionally for ores.

Q: Are sky-bases allowed?
A: Yes, BUT only until MU (Meet-Up), then you must come down.

Q: Am I allowed to kill others via Lava, Gravel, etc...?
A: Yes, but not before PvP. This kind of killing is called iPvP, just so you know ;)

Ban List


Robo's/Sulorak's Games: Previous Winners
#1 (Moles Rto6): Glitchy1, Sulorak, Ducksfanwaterloo, Panda137, Steven5703, _quesadillas_ (Mole).
#2 (Slave Market & KotS): MLGtino, Sulorak, Vidmaster13579.
#3 (Mystery Teams of 3): Emeraldsword85, smitdalt, _quesadillas_.
!Community Favorite! #4 (CTM): Emeraldsword85, Ducksfanwaterloo, _quesadillas_, Glitchy1, xgonzo_kick_assx, Ironsoldier.
#5 (Vanilla Cto2): Killerbye22 & Roqqan
#6 (BigTeamsOf10v10): xgonzo_kick_assx, Sulorak, Glitchy1, Emeraldsword85, roboticboy16, battleship811
#7 (Endurance & Mario Kart FFA): EmeraldSword85
#8 (Rto2! XtrApple, & Health Donor): Sulorak and lil_greg15
#9 (Blocked /w Amplified World! Cto3): Sulorak, Emeraldsword85, & Precise
#10 (Kings Cto4 /w Energy Drain): Emeraldsword85, Sulorak, MLGtino (King), Slicorn, and Merlinmaster.
#11 (Rto3 /w Actually Monsters Inc. & Bench Blitz): Emeraldsword85, TitPunch, Ducksfanwaterloo
#12 (FFA /w Go To Hell!): Panda137
!Halloween Special! #13 (Cto5 /w Lights Out, Chicken, Moles, 50 Hearts, Nightmare Mode, Eternal Night, & Risky Retrieval): Me <3, Emeraldsword85, jojobloblo, Panda137 & MLGtino (Mole).
#14 (Slave Market & 3x Arrows): Me <3, Killerbye22, Panda137, AtditC
#15 (FFA /w Cut Clean): D00ZiE
#16 (To2 Cut Clean): lil_greg15 & Fishyfacediamond
#17 (30 Minute FFA /w Potion Swap): TNTTurtles
#18 (Slave Market & Sudden Death): Me <3, Roqqan, Killerbye22, Panda137
#19 (Cto3 /w Damage Cycle): Sulorak, Rot43, MLGtino
#20 (Rto2 /w Assault n Battery): Cole1crc & BennetXL
#21 (FFA Triple Ores & Assassins): AwarriorVenom
#22 (Cto4 Moles & Pyrotechnics): (Moles) Me <3, Pie55555 & TNTTurtles
#23 (Slave Market /w Damage Dodgers & Time Bomb): Speedybeaner, Sulorak, lil_greg15, Vidmaster13579, GI_Jose360
#24 (UHC Reboot: Moles/Slave Market): VennyMouse, MasterProX, Snoozin, Spookz__, _Cyanide, 99250, Steven5703, MLGtino, RefuseToSink, FIyhacks, 
#25 (Mystery Teams/Potential Hearts): TBD
#26 (Big Teams of 10/Moles): TBD
#27
Special Thanks to @Sulorak (Michael) for hosting the server <3

NOTE: Staff has approved of this and allowed me to post the IP here and link this topic whenever I host another UHC match. I will not get banned for this, so don't worry.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to post them and I will answer them, along with adding them to the thread.

replies.body: Ultra Hard Core. It's a minecraft gamemode where you can only heal with golden apples and health potions. You gain resources and pvp team vs team or player vs player.

replies.body:
Gratz to my squad, through hard work and dedication, we pulled through. We were in the lowest lows, but at the end of the day we came out on the top. As a great man once said...

“Now there is a final reason I think that Jesus says, "Love your enemies." It is this: that love has within it a redemptive power. And there is a power there that eventually transforms individuals. Just keep being friendly to that person. Just keep loving them, and they can’t stand it too long. Oh, they react in many ways in the beginning. They react with guilt feelings, and sometimes they’ll hate you a little more at that transition period, but just keep loving them. And by the power of your love they will break down under the load. That’s love, you see. It is redemptive, and this is why Jesus says love. There’s something about love that builds up and is creative. There is something about hate that tears down and is destructive. So love your enemies" - Martin Luther King Jr.  

Here is a post victory pic! (Although Janner and Ed were not with me in the flesh, they were with me in spirit throughout the whole game <3)
replies.body_tagged:

Just keep being friendly to that person. Just keep loving them, and they can’t stand it too long. Oh, they react in many ways in the beginning. They react with guilt feelings, and sometimes they’ll hate you a little more at that transition period, but just keep loving them. And by the power of your love they will break down under the load. That’s love, you see. It is redemptive, and this is why Jesus says love. There’s something about love that builds up and is creative. There is something about hate that tears down and is destructive. So love your enemies" - Martin Luther King Jr.  

Here is a post victory pic! (Although Janner and Ed were not with me in the flesh, they were with me in spirit throughout the whole game <3)
